title: Gas Prices Falling, HSAs And Navigating Busy Airports
teaser: The average price for a gallon of gas in Wisconsin has dipped to below $3 for the first time in nearly four years , according to AAA Wisconsin. In this week’s On Your Money, Joy Cardin and financial planner Kevin McKinley discuss what’s behind the decline and why the news isn’t all good for everyone. Plus, he has advice on opening a health savings account and navigating crowded airports around the holidays.
